response.message: That's great! I still have hopes for Careers, although I can't say I've gotten any benefit out of my money yet.

So, it DOES take a rocket scientist to get hired at Stack Overflow? That explains a lot.

Sorry, but comment is obligatory.
So, what, your valued associates aren't numbered any longer?
@Brett, that is what I was going to ask.

> Is this an Area 51 rocket?

Yes.

>So, it DOES take a rocket scientist to get hired at Stack Overflow? That explains a lot.

Nice.  I actually never thought of that one, but I think I'll start using it for... everything.
I was gonna say: "Glad to see you've got a rocket scientist on the team!"
